body: Whenever the beast-bonded witch is capable of learning a new feat, she may choose to instead have her familiar learn the feat as a bonus feat. The familiar must meet the prerequisites for any feats that it learns this way. If her familiar is lost or dies, the witch can reclaim the feat slots and select new feats for herself, or apply the slots toward her new familiar.
name: Transfer Feats
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Witch/Witch Archetypes/Beast-Bonded/Transfer Feats
